scripts.dev: env-cmd -f ./config/.env npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && env-cmd -f ./config/.env npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all && env-cmd -f ./config/.env nodemon server.js
scripts.migrate: env-cmd -f ./config/.env npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production && env-cmd -f ./config/.env npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env production
